event.title: FOSDEM booth & Legal and Policy Devroom (online)

body.p: As every year, the FSFE will be present at FOSDEM, the biggest annual Free Software event in Europe. In this year's edition we will co-host the Legal and Policy Issues Devroom for the second time. If you want to stay updated and are interested in some of our other activities, you can visit our digital booth. Everyone can join. The participation is free, no registration is needed. The event is in English.
